company.name: MyLoan
company.slogan: Your partner for fast, simple and secure credit.

express.title: Express Credit
express.content: Express credit offers great flexibility for all your urgent money needs: expenses, repairs, or unexpected bills. If you’re looking for quick credit without refusal, opt for simplicity by accessing instant funds without the hassle of traditional procedures.

auto.title: Car Loan
auto.content: Lower interest rates than personal loans make car loans often more advantageous to finance the purchase of a new vehicle. Discover the best quick credit offers from the Youdge simulator and drive toward your project without being held back by lack of budget.

personal.title: Personal Loans
personal.content: Need cash for a big project? The personal loan is here to meet your specific needs. Youdge explains how it works, how to access it, and its personalized conditions. Compare offers through our simulator and choose the peace of mind of this fast and tailored credit!

works.title: Home Improvement Loan
works.content: Specifically designed to help you carry out your renovation and home improvement projects, the works loan is the ideal way to manage your budget effectively. Learn how to get funds for your projects immediately thanks to our quick credit offers.

revolving.title: Revolving Credit
revolving.content: If you need a permanent reserve of money available at any time, revolving credit allows you to access it whenever you want. This fast credit offers the flexibility you need to manage your budget in real time. Discover the offer that suits you best through our simulator.

consolidation.title: Credit Consolidation
consolidation.content: Credit consolidation is your chance to regain control of your finances. It offers a wide range of solutions to effectively consolidate your debts and simplify your budget management. Youdge shows you how to use it to increase your chances of saving money.

categories.title2: at the heart of our business
categories.paragraph: Our mission is to simplify your credit application by allowing you to apply directly online for the best offers on the market. As an expert in fast credit, Youdge is here to make your process easier: fewer steps and intermediaries, all the way to getting your loan in just a few clicks! Fully digital and 100% secure, we guarantee credit adapted to your needs, whatever the urgency of your project.

title.paragraph: Our proprietary technology analyzes in real-time the eligibility of your credit request according to the criteria of our 300+ partners, lenders, and online credit organizations. Fewer steps, forms, and intermediaries: Youdge centralizes all your procedures in just a few clicks! Discover the different types of fast credits and find the one that suits you.

cards.paragraph: the credit of your choice via our simulator

cards.title: Receive instantly

title.paragraph: Discover our comparison through key figures

card1.title: Borrow €1000, repay €36/month over 36 months
card1.description: Example for a €1000 financing (excluding optional insurance) over 36 months at a fixed APR of 20.89%: 36 monthly payments of €36.71 over 36 months. Total amount owed by the borrower: €1321.56 - including €321.56 interest - excluding optional insurance. The cost of optional insurance for a borrower is €6.90 per month, to be added to the monthly payment for death, disability, and incapacity coverage.

card2.title: Borrow €3000, repay €80/month over 60 months
card2.description: Example for a €3000 financing (excluding optional insurance) over 60 months at a fixed APR of 22.91%: 60 monthly payments of €80.83 over 60 months. Total amount owed by the borrower: €4849.80 - including €1849.80 interest - excluding optional insurance. The cost of optional insurance for a borrower is €20.70 per month, to be added to the monthly payment for death, disability, and incapacity coverage.

card3.title: Borrow €5000, repay €104/month over 72 months
card3.description: Example for a €5000 financing (excluding optional insurance) over 72 months at a fixed APR of 15.67%: 72 monthly payments of €104.76 over 72 months. Total amount owed by the borrower: €7542.72 - including €2542.72 interest - excluding optional insurance. The cost of optional insurance for a borrower is €12.60 per month, to be added to the monthly payment for death, disability, and incapacity coverage.

card4.title: Borrow €10,000, repay €208/month over 72 months
card4.description: Example for a €10,000 financing (excluding optional insurance) over 72 months at a fixed APR of 15.67%: 72 monthly payments of €208.76 over 72 months. card.title: Buy a house:
card.subtitle: make your real estate dream come true with a suitable loan
card.description: Buying a house is a major step in life, often synonymous with stability and long-term investment. To make this project a reality, it is essential to understand the different financing options available. A home loan adapted to your financial situation can make all the difference. Discover how to choose the right loan, the criteria to consider, and the key steps to successfully buying your home with peace of mind.

text1.title: What is a
text1.paragraph: A mortgage is financing intended for the purchase of real estate. It allows you to borrow a large sum of money over a long period, usually 15 to 25 years. This type of loan is specifically designed to help buyers achieve their real estate project by spreading repayment over several years.

text2.title: Why take out a
text2.paragraph: Taking out a mortgage has several advantages. First, it allows you to finance the purchase of a home without using up most of your savings. In addition, mortgage rates are often more favorable than other types of credit, making the total cost of financing more affordable. Finally, mortgages may offer tax benefits, particularly regarding interest payments.

text3.title: How to choose the right
text3.paragraph: The choice of a mortgage depends on several criteria. It is important to consider the borrowed amount, loan duration, interest rate (fixed or variable), as well as additional fees such as processing fees and borrower’s insurance. It is also advisable to compare offers from different banks and financial institutions to find the one that best suits your profile and project.

text4.title: The key steps to
text4.paragraph: Buying a house with a mortgage involves several steps. First, it is essential to define your budget and search for the property that meets your needs. Then, you must prepare a solid application for the loan, providing all the required supporting documents. Once the loan is approved, you need to sign the loan offer and then sign the deed of sale with the notary. Finally, it is important to manage loan repayments properly throughout its duration.

card.title: Need Financing:
card.description: This section is dedicated to your financing needs. Whether you want to carry out renovations, buy a vehicle, or fund a personal project, we are here to support you in your steps. Do not hesitate to share your needs and expectations with us.

texte1.paragraph: A personal loan is financing intended for personal projects, such as renovations, buying a vehicle, or unexpected expenses. Unlike a mortgage, it does not require collateral and can be obtained quickly.

texte2.paragraph: The personal loan offers great flexibility, with amounts and repayment terms adapted to your needs. In addition, interest rates are often competitive, making it an attractive option for financing your projects.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a personal loan, simply contact us to discuss your project. We will guide you through the application process, help you gather the necessary documents, and explain the loan conditions.

card.title: Car Loan:
card.h2: finance your vehicle with peace of mind
card.description: The car loan is a financing solution specifically designed for purchasing a vehicle. Whether it is a new or used car, this type of loan allows you to finance your automotive project with confidence. It features advantageous conditions and personalized support.

texte1.paragraph: A car loan is a loan intended to finance the purchase of a vehicle, whether new or used. It allows borrowers to spread the cost of their purchase over a determined period, making budget management easier.

texte2.paragraph: A car loan offers several advantages, including competitive interest rates and flexible repayment terms. Additionally, it allows you to preserve your savings while achieving your automotive project.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a car loan, simply contact us to discuss your project. We will guide you throughout the application process, helping you gather the necessary documents and explaining the loan conditions.

card.title: Express Credit:
card.description: Need a quick boost to face an emergency? Express credit is an instant loan solution with simplified procedures. Repairs, purchases, or unexpected bills: it adapts to any situation. This urgent loan allows you to obtain immediate funds without having to provide a multitude of supporting documents. Youdge details its terms (rates, conditions, benefits, etc.) and how to apply step by step.

texte1.paragraph: Express credit is part of the consumer credit family but stands out for its speed and simplified formalities. Unlike traditional loans, online express credit offers attractive annual rates and real-time tracking of your file via emails or SMS, making it an ideal solution in case of unforeseen events.

texte2.paragraph: Express credit is intended for adults whose tax residence is in France, who need money quickly. The institutions offering it are increasingly numerous and address all consumer profiles. However, not all these institutions are equal, and it is often more advantageous to go through a credit comparison service first, which lists the different online credit offers and instantly submits the most advantageous ones.

texte3.title1: How long does it take for
texte3.paragraph: One of the main advantages of online express credit is the quick release of funds. After the initial agreement, it usually takes no more than 48 hours to receive the transfer on your account, along with the legal withdrawal period, if applicable. In some cases, the release is immediate. This makes express credit an ideal solution for urgent needs, without having to justify the use of funds. In addition, it is possible to repay early with reduced penalties, unlike some financial institutions. This is a significant advantage that applies to all types of fast credit, from small amounts (micro express credit) to larger amounts.

texte4.paragraph: The advantage of express credit is that it is accessible to the majority. Taking out express credit online is possible for anyone who needs cash quickly, whatever the reason: home repairs, buying a new car, plane tickets, or building a cash reserve to cope with unexpected expenses. This fast credit has interesting strengths. It allows you to quickly carry out your projects, whether renovating your home, going on vacation, or celebrating an important event. The advantage of this type of loan is that you can apply in just a few clicks. Its key strengths are speed and simplicity.

card.title: Instant Credit:
card.description: Instant credit is a financing solution that allows you to get funds quickly, without the usual delays of traditional banks. Whether it is for an urgent project or an unexpected expense, this type of loan is designed to meet your immediate cash needs.

texte1.paragraph: Instant credit is part of the consumer credit family but stands out for its speed and simplified formalities. Unlike traditional loans, online instant credit offers attractive annual rates and real-time tracking of your file via emails or SMS, making it an ideal solution in case of unforeseen events.

texte2.paragraph: Instant credit is intended for adults whose tax residence is in France, who need money quickly. The institutions offering it are increasingly numerous and address all consumer profiles. However, not all these institutions are equal, and it is often more advantageous to go through a credit comparison service first, which lists the different online credit offers and instantly submits the most advantageous ones.

texte3.title1: How long does it take for
texte3.paragraph: One of the main advantages of online instant credit is the quick release of funds. After the initial agreement, it usually takes no more than 48 hours to receive the transfer on your account, along with the legal withdrawal period, if applicable. In some cases, the release is immediate. This makes instant credit an ideal solution for urgent needs, without having to justify the use of funds. In addition, it is possible to repay early with reduced penalties, unlike some financial institutions. This is a significant advantage that applies to all types of fast credit, from small amounts (micro instant credit) to larger amounts.

texte4.paragraph: The advantage of instant credit is that it is accessible to the majority. Taking out instant credit online is possible for anyone who has a short-term cash need, whatever the reason: home repairs, buying a new car, plane tickets, or building a cash reserve for unexpected expenses. This fast credit has interesting strengths and allows projects to be completed quickly, whether renovating your home, going on vacation, or celebrating an important event. The advantage is that the application can be made in just a few clicks. The main strength of instant credit is its speed and simplicity.

card.title: Revolving Credit:
card.description: Revolving credit is a flexible financing solution that allows access to funds at any time, within a predefined limit. It works like a cash reserve that the borrower can use as needed, with repayments adapted to their financial situation. This option is ideal for projects requiring flexibility in financing.

texte1.paragraph: Revolving credit is a type of loan that allows the borrower to have a cash reserve they can use at any time, within a pre-defined limit.

texte2.paragraph: Revolving credit works like a cash reserve that the borrower can use as needed. When a part of this reserve is used, the borrower must repay the amount used with interest calculated on the borrowed amount.

texte3.paragraph: Revolving credit offers great flexibility because the borrower can use the funds as needed and repay at their own pace. It also allows dealing with unexpected expenses or financing short-term projects.

texte4.paragraph: To obtain revolving credit, the borrower usually must provide information about their financial situation, including income and expenses. Conditions vary depending on the lender.

card.title: Credit Without Proof:
card.description: This section is dedicated to credit without proof. Whether you want to finance a personal project, an urgent purchase, or any other expense, we are here to assist you in your steps. Feel free to let us know your needs and expectations.

texte1.paragraph: Credit without proof is a financing solution that allows you to obtain funds quickly without providing proof of expenses. This makes it particularly suitable for personal projects or urgent purchases.

texte2.paragraph: Credit without proof works similarly to other types of consumer loans. The borrower applies for credit, and if approved, receives the funds quickly, often within a few days.

texte3.paragraph: The main advantage of credit without proof is the speed and simplicity of the process. There is no need to provide documents detailing the use of funds, which accelerates approval and disbursement.

texte4.paragraph: To obtain credit without proof, the borrower usually must provide information about their financial situation, including income and expenses. Conditions vary depending on the lender.

card.title: Create a Business:
card.description: This section is dedicated to your business creation project. Whether you want to launch a startup, open a store, or expand an existing business, we are here to assist you in your financing steps. Feel free to share your needs and expectations.

texte1.paragraph: A business creation loan is a financing solution specifically designed to help entrepreneurs launch their project. It can take the form of loans, grants, or other financial assistance schemes.

texte2.paragraph: Choosing a business creation loan has several advantages. It provides the necessary funds to start the activity, invest in equipment, cover initial operating costs, and enhance credibility with partners and clients.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a business creation loan, it is generally necessary to present a solid file including a business plan, financial forecasts, and information about the management team.

card.title: Student Loan:
card.description: The student loan is a financing solution specifically designed for students. It allows you to cover tuition fees, living expenses, and other study-related costs. With favorable conditions and competitive interest rates, this loan helps you focus on your studies without worrying about your finances.

texte1.paragraph: The student loan is a financing solution specifically designed to help students cover tuition fees, living expenses, and other study-related costs. It may take the form of low-interest loans, scholarships, or other financial aid programs.

texte2.paragraph: Choosing a student loan has several advantages. It provides the necessary funds to finance studies, eases the financial burden during the learning period, and offers flexible repayment conditions.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a student loan, it is generally necessary to present a solid application including information about your course, financial needs, and any guarantees.

card.title: Travel Loan
card.h2: Make your escape dreams come true
card.description: This section is dedicated to your travel project. Whether you want to go on vacation, organize a business trip, or discover new destinations, we are here to support you in your financing process. Feel free to share your needs and expectations.

texte1.paragraph: The travel loan is a financing solution specifically designed to help travelers achieve their escape projects. It can cover transportation, accommodation, meals, and on-site activities.

texte2.paragraph: Choosing a travel loan has several advantages. It provides the necessary funds to finance your escape projects, eases the financial burden during trip planning, and offers flexible repayment conditions.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a travel loan, it is generally necessary to submit a solid application including information about the travel project, financial needs, and possible guarantees.

card.title: Renovation Loan:
card.description: This section is dedicated to your renovation project. Whether you want to renovate your house, improve energy efficiency, or make extensions, we are here to support you in your financing process. Feel free to share your needs and expectations.

texte1.paragraph: The renovation loan is a financing solution designed to help homeowners carry out renovation, improvement, or extension work on their property. It can cover the costs of materials, labor, and other expenses related to the work.

texte2.paragraph: Choosing a renovation loan has several advantages. It provides the necessary funds to finance renovation projects, improves the value of the property, and offers flexible repayment conditions.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a renovation loan, it is generally necessary to submit a solid application including information about the renovation project, financial needs, and possible guarantees.

card.title: Credit Buyback:
card.description: This section is dedicated to credit buyback. Whether you want to consolidate your loans to reduce your monthly payments or benefit from a better rate, we are here to support you in the process. Feel free to share your needs and expectations.

texte1.paragraph: Credit buyback is a financial operation that consists of consolidating multiple loans into one, in order to simplify the management of your finances and reduce the monthly payment amount.

texte2.paragraph: Choosing a credit buyback has several advantages. It reduces the monthly payment amount, provides a better interest rate, and simplifies the management of your finances.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a credit buyback, it is generally necessary to submit a solid application including information about the loans to be consolidated, financial needs, and any guarantees.

card.title: Get Married
card.description: This section is dedicated to your wedding project. Whether you want to organize an intimate ceremony or a large reception, we are here to support you in your financing process. Feel free to share your needs and expectations.

texte1.paragraph: The wedding loan is a financing solution specifically designed to help couples realize their wedding project. It can cover expenses related to organizing the ceremony, venue rental, decoration, photography, and much more.

texte2.paragraph: Choosing a wedding loan has several advantages. It allows couples to have the funds necessary to finance their wedding, reduce financial burden, and benefit from flexible repayment terms.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a wedding loan, it is generally necessary to submit a complete application including information about the wedding project, financial needs, and any guarantees.

card.title: Seniors:
card.description: This section is dedicated to seniors. Whether you want to finance a retirement project, a trip, or any other expense, we are here to support you in your financing process. Feel free to share your needs and expectations.

texte1.paragraph: The senior loan is a financing solution specifically designed to help elderly people carry out their projects. It can cover expenses related to health, housing, or leisure activities.

texte2.paragraph: Choosing a senior loan has several advantages. It allows you to access the funds needed to finance your projects, reduce financial burden, and benefit from flexible repayment conditions.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a senior loan, it is generally necessary to submit a complete application including information about the project, financial needs, and any guarantees.

card.title: Your Projects:
card.description: This section is dedicated to your projects. Whether you want to carry out renovations, buy a vehicle, or finance a trip, we are here to support you in your financing process. Feel free to share your needs and expectations.

texte1.paragraph: The project loan is a financing solution specifically designed to help individuals realize their projects. It can cover expenses related to renovations, purchasing a vehicle, or a trip.

texte2.paragraph: Choosing a project loan has several advantages. It allows you to access the funds needed to finance your project, reduce financial burden, and benefit from flexible repayment conditions.

texte3.paragraph: To obtain a project loan, it is generally necessary to submit a complete application including information about the project, financial needs, and any guarantees.
